metadata.description: A Moonstone Crime Wave event! Ride the rails with the man who knows your story, whether you're willing to tell it or not! The Traveler is destined to ride this train alongside passengers with questionable fates. Fates that must be explored as they come to this crossroads, then guided along to their final destination. Together these three eerie stories showcase the Traveler at his best, with plenty of moody atmosphere and emotion. Pry open a deeper insight into of the most enigmatic comic characters of all time!
metadata.name: Mysterious Traveler: Nobody Rides For Free
